      2024 - Arcade game

      Submission to Mini Jam 152-Heroes. 2 little heroes got 2 new acessories and began to do Heroish things.

      2024 - Platformer game

      Action-packed (including pans!) platformer game where you clear levels for the sake of saving hotel of cute hotelier.

      2023 - 3D Model

      First 3D model made in Blender. It's only a wireframe, thought.

    • Okayga - The suika game

      2023 - Puzzle game

      Try to stack as much eggs as possible before you run out of space!

    • dotaConfigs

      2023 - Repository - Java project

      Everything that creates and uses Dota2 Configurations files. Get weekly-updated hero grids with information like pickrates, winrates, etc directly in your game client.

      Link
    • Random Godot projects

      2023 - Repository

      Collection of Godot projects - games, animations, MVPs. Constantly updated.

    • Vib-Ribbon

      2023 - 3D Art

      One of the first 3D models of mine that was made in BlockBench.

    • Spiky Situation

      2022 - Game

      Hypercasual game where you play as bird and should tap the screen to dodge spikes. It was made at 3AM in 2.5 hours.

      Link
    • Rocket Dodger

      2021 - Game

      Arcade game where you dodge rockets and score points for every exploded one.

      Link
    • Jumpy Adventure

      2021 - Game

      Platformer where you should reach the top of the Laboratory. Very hard game that even I couldn't complete.
